title: TUI: separate solved and unsolved issues in list view
description:
The TUI issue view does not visually separate solved and unsolved issues. Everything is mixed together, which makes it hard to scan active work and verify completion status quickly.

Expected behavior:
- Clearly split issues by status in the TUI list (e.g., unsolved vs solved/done/wontfix).
- Maintain clear section headers and/or ordering so open/active items are prioritized.
- Preserve existing CLI behavior and filters, but improve TUI discoverability for state.

This is a UX issue for active session operators that rely on the TUI for quick triage and task management.
